author: Lisa Rapaport
title: Explainer: What is contact tracing and how can it help fight the new coronavirus?
description: Contact tracing has been used for decades to control the spread of infectious diseases. The basic idea is simple: track down infected people, then find everyone who has been near them and encourage those people to stay home until it is clear they are not sick.
